product.title: LEWENTECH Gaming Mouse 6 Adjustable DPI Up to 7200 Wired PC Gaming Mouse 8 Programmable Buttons 13 Adjustable RGB LED Modes 1.5 M Drag-Free Paracord Ergonomic Mouse Windows/PC/Mac/Laptop (White)
product.categories_flat: Video Games > PC > Accessories > Gaming Mice

a_plus_content.company_description_text: About LEWENTECH LEWENTECH is a quality Gaming Accessories brand,To make it easier for you to get game experience using a wired gaming mouse, LEWENTECH began to produce the gaming mouse, We take strict control of every procedure, from product selection to manufacture, between quality inspection and logistics, made with superior quality material!It’s not just a mouse, it’s a gaming enthusiast solution!Create a cozy gaming environment with LEWENTECH

feature_bullets: Intelligent Sensitive 6 DPI Levels : LEWENTECH Wired Gaming Mouse Geared with 6 Redefinable DPI Levels (default as: 1200/1800/2400/3600/4800/7200), According user's preference setup different DPI and Rolling Rate suitable for games, office and many occasions.

8 Buttons Including Fire Button : PC gaming mice have 8 buttons, whatever game or work you are engaging can set for more functions like rapid fire, macro etc. Software is initial setup. Side buttons are default as forward, backward for efficiency surfing, this usb mouse offers ultimate customization for gaming or productivity tasks, giving you the advantage of quick, efficient commands (Non-programmable).

13 Different RGB Lighting Modes : PC gaming mouse has 13 adjustable RGB lights, Rainbow Strip with Changeable RGB Colors, You can switch the lighting mode by clicking the button, can be a single color, RGB, or off (The light turns off when the button is pressed fourteenth time), The RGB lights is more vibrant than basic light up mice, Muti-colors lights greatly match your style, provide you fancy gaming environment and highlight your game atmosphere.

LEWENTECH PC Gaming Mouse : PC Wired gaming mouse The braided wire is used to form a 1.5 M long wire and 3 million clicks for extra durability, double click key in the thumb area adopts polygon non-slip texture, and the blind operation accuracy is increased by 60%, Ergonomic Design Perfectly fits under your palm, gives gamers the most comfortable gaming experienece and makes you feel free from fatigue.
PTFE Mouse Feet : Made from the highest grade of PTFE, the mouse feet on the front, rear, and sensor ring allows it to glide smoothly across any surface.

Wide Compatibility : As a plug-and-play wired mouse, easy to use and work with Windows XP / Vista / Win7 / Win8 / Win10 / Mac OS etc, You can feel the solid construction of all buttons, If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and LEWENTECH will answer your questions within 24 hours!

top_reviews.title: Super affordable & durable.
top_reviews.body: So I can't tell you too much about how it works for gaming as I bought this for my son who lost his gaming privileges after I ordered it. So now mom has a fun pretty mouse for my laptop. The lights are so fun and there's so many different combinations to choose from. It's very comfortable to use and very affordable with amazing quality. The braided cable makes it's last longer and there's a button to adjust the sensitivity. One day I hope to to see him using it to game but that's still TBD at this point. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
So I can't tell you too much about how it works for gaming as I bought this for my son who lost his gaming privileges after I ordered it. So now mom has a fun pretty mouse for my laptop. The lights are so fun and there's so many different combinations to choose from. It's very comfortable to use and very affordable with amazing quality. The braided cable makes it's last longer and there's a button to adjust the sensitivity. One day I hope to to see him using it to game but that's still TBD at this point.

This is awesome for gaming and computer work. This white mouse compliments my pink gaming chair and keyboard at work. This fits my hand perfectly and doesn’t irritate my writes, high quality and highly recommend! Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2025

top_reviews.title: Works, but not for everyone.
top_reviews.body: The mouse itself works fine, but the forward and back buttons on the side protrude further out than I expected. Being left handed, I was having issues with my wedding ring hitting those buttons constantly. Also the lights DO NOT GO OUT. There is not an off setting for the lights, and that is quite annoying at night-time when not in use. The turbo button seems to work ok, though i've only used it once, to keep from repeated clicking. I'm not sure if it was the game limitation or the mouse, but it seemed to go more three round burst, then rest and repeat. Instead of pew pew pew pew pew, it was more like pew pew pew, wait a second, pew pew pew. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The mouse itself works fine, but the forward and back buttons on the side protrude further out than I expected. top_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to use for beginner gamers as well.
top_reviews.body: Neat mouse. Not as small as the others so it fits perfectly in your hand while gaming. The mouse has a very smooth and sleek design for a right handed gamer. It changes colors (as in the video) to 13 different LED modes. Really easy to use as it glides smoothly across the surface of my desk. Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2025

top_reviews.title: Budget mouse, no complaints.
top_reviews.body: I've got larger hands so I need a larger mouse, this one came in just a little small for my taste but it works just fine. It's a little light, I generally prefer mouses with rubberized buttons but overall, I would get this one again. Read more
